commands.statement:
SELECT DF.DocumentNo , DF.FormID , DF.Title , DF.CreatorName , DF.Tags , DF.CreatedAt FROM DocumentForm DF WHERE DF.DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DF.FormID = @FormID;
SELECT DD.DetailNo , DD.DocumentNo , DD.WorkDate , DD.ProductName , DD.Quantity , DD.UnitPrice , DD.Amount , DD.Surtax FROM DocumentForm DF INNER JOIN DocumentDetail DD ON DF.DocumentNo = DD.DocumentNo WHERE DD.DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DF.FormID = @FormID AND DD.DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';

statement.if: INSERT INTO DocumentDetail ( DocumentNo , WorkDate , Standard , PaymentToName , Amount , Surtax , DetailCategory , CreatedAt ) VALUES ( @DocumentNo , @WorkDate , @Standard , @PaymentToName , @Amount , @Surtax , 'DetailItems1' , DATETIME('NOW', 'localtime') );

UPDATE DocumentDetail SET WorkDate = @WorkDate , Standard = @Standard , PaymentToName = @PaymentToName , Amount = @Amount , Surtax = @Surtax , ModifiedAt = DATETIME('NOW', 'localtime') WHERE DetailNo = @DetailNo AND DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';
DELETE FROM DocumentDetail WHERE DetailNo = @DetailNo AND DocumentNo = @DocumentNo AND DetailCategory = 'DetailItems1';
